item.title: CVE-2024-1732|2024-04-02T09:32:09.089Z -- djamio1988 -- Sharkdropship Dropshipping & Affiliate for for AliExpress
item.description: The Sharkdropship for AliExpress Dropshipping and Affiliate plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to a missing capability check on the wads_removeProductFromShop() function in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.4. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to delete arbitrary posts.
